ctx: intros Q a p Hcanonical Hred1 r s Hred2 Hred3 r1 s1 Hreduce1 Hreduce2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (eqP A eqA n r1 s1).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a : Term A n p : list (Term A n) Hcanonical : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) Hred1 : forall q : list (Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> ltP (A:=A) ltM q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> ReduStarConfluent Q q r, s : list (Term A n) Hred2 : reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a r) Hred3 : reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a s) r1, s1 : list (Term A n) Hreduce1 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a r) r1 Hreduce2 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a s) s1 Unable to unify "Prop" with "eqP A eqA n r1 s1".

original: intros Q a p Hcanonical Hred1 r s Hred2 Hred3 r1 s1 Hreduce1 Hreduce2. apply (eqP A eqA n r1 s1).
